name: Erotic Jigsaw Challenge Vol. 1
description:
Twenty puzzles of increasing difficulty await you. Can you rise to the challenge and solve them all, or will you be distracted? Keep it together and you may become the Jigsaw Master! It's going to take patience, but you can do it! A fun, relaxing challenge, with an erotic twist!
Twenty 100-piece puzzles for hours of fun.
Beautiful original sexy artwork.
Original music.
